arts.ttl: Cardiff v Peterborough, Huddersfield v Leyton Orient, and more: football – live
arts.sum: Clockwatch updates from Saturday’s football action Live scoreboard | Follow us on Bluesky | Mail Barry National League: Forest Green owner Dale Vince is one of the partners in an initiative where GPs can prescribe a day out watching his National League team as an alternative to antidepressants. And while the jokes obviously write themselves, it seems like a very good idea before a ball has been kicked in the current campaign. Eze Obasi reports … Newport County: David Hughes has a wealth of coaching experience at the highest level but is enjoying his first real tilt at frontline management in his new role as head coach of Newport County, who have one of the tiniest budgets in League Two. Interview: Ben Fisher. Continue reading...
